page.title: 03Shirley-The Resident's View.
page.content: We asked people who lived in Shirley the following questions: {What improvements would you like to {see?} More amenities for young people are needed and this might help reduce vandalism.A social club for adults is needed as well, as they only have the British Legion.Also elderly people need more care and more frequent visits from the Welfare. {What could be done about vandalism?} More police walking the beat and not in cars would be a start,and the police should pay more attention to Shirley and less to Solihull. {What do you think about the closure of {Sharman's Cross School?} It has a history of good education and should not be closed.Pupils from Shirley would then have to travel much further to get to school.
